text: Klára Bláhová (born 2 April 1973) is a Czech former professional tennis player. Bláhová made her only WTA Tour main draw appearance at the 1993 San Marino Open, where she featured as a qualifier and was beaten in the first round by Joannette Kruger. ==ITF finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:85%; width:15%;" |- style="background:lightblue;" | $25,000 tournaments |- style="background:#f0f8ff;" | $10,000 tournaments |} ===Singles: 4 (1–3)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
